## Decoding SPSS data

```{r}
is.haven <- function(x) "haven_labelled" %in% class(x)
with_labels <- Filter(is.haven, Telerobot_sorted) %>% names()
```


```{r}
Telerobot_decoded = Telerobot_sorted %>%
  mutate_at( vars(with_labels), as_factor)

Telerobot_decoded
```
